message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Could you consider that?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $85. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $82?

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession and offer it to you for $84. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $81?
I understand that you're really close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $83. It's still a good deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm really close to my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $80?
